title: LFT Or Duo. G4 ADC/ Supp Main
body:
As title states im lookin for flex Q or just a Solo Q Partner. Currently Gold 4 in Solo and S3 In flex. Looking to get better/ Climb.

 {{champion:63}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:267}} 

Please no cry babies/ Ragers/ Toxic ppl--- Just wanna have fun even if we lose . 

I have Discord if needed

IGN: x peppa pig x

replies.body:
haha peppa pig <3

I'm s2 support main if you're keen, add me: Walsh
